module.title: Win32 system module
module.description: Various system related checks, such as CPU load, process state, service state memory usage and PDH counters.
module.name: CheckSystem

check_cpu.description: Check that the load of the CPU(s) are within bounds.

commands.check_uptime: Check time since last server re-boot.
commands.check_service: Check the state of one or more of the computer services.
commands.check_process: Check state/metrics of one or more of the processes running on the computer.
commands.check_memory: Check free/used memory on the system.

check_pdh.desc: Check the value of a performance (PDH) counter.

commands.check_os_version: Check the version of the underlaying OS.
commands.check_pagefile: Check the size of the system pagefile(s).
